text: The Hindoo Dagger is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithNitin Govil. Orienting Hollywood: A Century of Film Culture between Los Angeles and BombayThe Hindoo Dagger and stars Harry Solter, Marion Leonard, and Arthur V. Johnson. ==Actors== * Harry Solter as Jack Windom * Marion Leonard as The Woman * Arthur V. Johnson as Tom * Robert Harron as Messenger * John R. Cumpson as The Doctor * George Gebhardt The Second Lover ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Hindoo Dagger
